1.description: Fast detection using SBOM package analysis

package.description: Package found in SBOM (npm, pypi, go, maven, rubygems, etc.)

import_statement.description: Import statement detected in source code

MEDIUM.description: Moderate indicator - common but not unique

LOW.description: Weak indicator - may have false positives

aggregation.description: When multiple detection methods find the same technology, use the highest confidence score
